pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet presents the existing foundation plan for the project at 296 Alderview Drive. It includes the layout of existing foundation walls, a 10' retaining wall, and floor joists at specified spacing. The plan outlines areas such as a cistern and unexcavated sections, providing dimensions for various structural elements.

pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet shows the existing ground floor plan, detailing the layout of rooms such as the family room, dining room, and garage. It includes existing steel beams and floor joists, as well as trusses in the garage area. Dimensions are provided for various structural and architectural elements.

pages.text_verbatim_title_block:
Project: 296 Alderview Drive
Client: Josh Hunke & Jenna Hunke
Drg. Title: STRUCTURAL NOTES
CAD Ref:
Scale:
Drawn By: Thasleema Shaji
Checked By:
Sheet No: 01/02
Job No: HUNKE
Revision No: 00
Date: 02/06/2025
pages.general_notes_verbatim:
GENERAL:
1. DESIGN & CONSTRUCTION OF ALL WORK ON THIS PROJECT SHALL CONFORM TO THE LATEST EDITION OF:
   - ONTARIO BUILDING CODE
   - CANADA BUILDING CODE
   - LOCAL BUILDING CODE
2. THE STRUCTURAL ENGINEERING REVIEW BY WADDELL ENGINEERING LTD. LEVELS OF FLOOR TO BE MAINTAINED UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED.
3. THE CONTRACTOR MUST VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS AT SITE AND REPORT ANY DISCREPANCIES TO THE DESIGNER BEFORE EXECUTING THE WORK.
4. ALL DIMENSIONS ARE IN FEET AND INCHES, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED.

MATERIALS:
1. MATERIALS SHALL CONFORM TO THE FOLLOWING REQUIREMENTS U.N.O. ON THE STAMPED DRAWING:
   - CONCRETE: OBC 3.3.1
   - REINFORCING STEEL: OBC 3.3.2
   - LUMBER & WOOD PRODUCTS: OBC 3.3.3
   - STEEL COLUMNS: OBC 3.3.4
   - STRUCTURAL STEEL: OBC 3.3.5
   - STEEL DECKING: OBC 3.3.6
   - STRUCTURAL BOLTS: ASTM A325
pages.page_overview_summary: This sheet contains comprehensive structural notes for the project, covering general design guidelines, material specifications, and requirements for footings and foundations. It provides essential information for ensuring compliance with building codes and standards, serving as a reference for the construction process.
